DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying quality life cancer survivor may help determine long-term effect hematologic cancer may help improve quality life future cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study quality life adult cancer survivor undergo previous bone marrow peripheral stem cell transplant childhood hematologic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Adult Cancer Survivors Who Have Undergone Previous Bone Marrow Peripheral Stem Cell Transplant Childhood Hematologic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine extent adult cancer survivor undergo prior bone marrow peripheral blood stem cell transplantation pediatric hematologic malignancy require ongoing health care whether need change increase time transplantation . - Correlate physical capability , body image , physical limitation , include sexuality issue alter influence lifestyle , time transplantation patient . - Determine whether cognitive ability relative memory neurobehavioral rating change increase time transplantation patient . - Correlate social relationship ability length time transplantation patient . OUTLINE : Patients sibling complete self-report quality life questionnaire , include outcome assessment neuroendocrine function , cognitive ability , physical capability , psychosocial behavior . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 750 patient ( 375 adult cancer survivor [ case group ] 375 sibling [ control group ] ) accrue study within 7 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Case group Previously treat allogeneic , unrelated , syngeneic , autologous bone marrow peripheral blood stem cell transplantation hematologic malignancy â‰¥ 5 year ago enrol 1 follow protocol : FHCRC160.06 FHCRC179.07T FHCRC446.03T FHCRC661.04 FHCRC697.00 FHCRC796.00 FHCRC843.00 Diseasefree survivor Under 18 year age time transplantation Any prior preparative regimen allow Control group Sexmatched sibling within 5 year patient 's age* No chronic illness ( e.g. , cancer , diabetes , asthma ) require medication No allergies limit physical activity NOTE : *If sibling available , another sibling available , sibling would ask nominate friend relative gender patient also within 5 year patient 's age ; patient must consent order control subject participate PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age See Disease Characteristics 18 Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Not specify Hepatic Not specify Renal Not specify Other Must able speak , read , write English PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy See Disease Characteristics Chemotherapy Not specify Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy Not specify Surgery Not specify
